channel.title: Got a mime mask on a lvl 3
channel.description: I thought that mimes only came while doing combat.. well I guess not, because I woke up today to find one of my miners with a mine mask in his inventory! lol, pretty rare I guess.

item.title: Got a mime mask on a lvl 3
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Loz:

I thought that mimes only came while doing combat… well I guess not, because I woke up today to find one of my miners with a mine mask in his inventory! lol, pretty rare I guess.

Rofl, yeah it happened to me when I was using an auto spammer.

Funny though, I played legit for like a year or two and have never gotten one. I start a level 3 account and then over night it gets one

Read full topic
item.source: Got a mime mask on a lvl 3
